subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the eighth inning, Carlos Beltran, rather than slide on a close play at the plate, tried to score standing up and was tagged out, erasing what would have been the go-ahead run.
snippet: In the eighth inning, Carlos Beltran, rather than slide on a close play at the plate, tried to score standing up and was tagged out, erasing what would have been the go-ahead run.
